[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6113.mp4, 6113.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7106513301663698219?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6113 by Dr Asteria
[[/<]]
-----

This is a very, very cute article and the first art I did for pride this year. it's super sweet. and I really like the characters in it. I can't speak highly enough about this article.

This one's been in my back pocket for a few months, haha. Wanted to do something cute for pride month! You know, lol. 

I also really like the way the art turned out! I knew I wanted to do a couple of em for different pride flags so I started with this one and just. It looks great and I'm proud of it. 

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
